alert.note: Alert for East Laramie County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 25 at 2:38AM MST until December 27 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 60 mph. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Banner, Kimball, and Cheyenne County. In Wyoming, East Laramie County. * WHEN...5 PM MST Monday until 5 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous or impossible travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and near zero visibilities in falling and blowing snow. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong cross winds along Interstate 80 will be hazardous to light weight or high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Prepare for possible blizzard conditions. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
